poem:
**Shadows of Trade**

In the labyrinth of power,  
nations whisper under digital skies;  
a dance of shadows,  
ghosts of control flicker,  
wrapped in the ephemeral scroll  
of a modern bazaar.  
Echoes of language falter  
where screens respond with silence,  
lost in the tide of voices,  
seeking refuge  
in the cradle of the West.
